name: Ritzy Elephant Racing
description:
Begin your epic adventure with Ritzy Elephant Racing!!

This addicting and challenging gameplay goes on forever to meet your entertainment needs. The family and kids will love it!

One of the Most addictive physics-based 3D Racing game!

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking Elephant.
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
